achievements.name: Turnover
achievements.desc: Knock a Cryo Slime out of the hands of a Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier.

achievements.name: Tear Down This Wall!
achievements.desc: Destroy an Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl's shield.

achievements.name: No Ice for Me, Thanks
achievements.desc: Defeat a Cryo Samachurl before it is able to create an ice pillar.

achievements.name: ...The Harder They Fall
achievements.desc: Destroy a Cryo Samachurl's ice pillar.

achievements.name: Chilly-Churl
achievements.desc: Defeat a Frostarm Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

achievements.name: "Rosebud..."
achievements.desc: Break a Cryo Cicin Mage's Ward.

achievements.name: Assassin of Kings
achievements.desc: Defeat the true ruler of Dragonspine?

achievements.name: David and Goliath
achievements.desc: Paralyze a Ruin Grader by attacking its weak point.
